member.name: D3D11_LIBRARY_DESC.Creator
member.summary: The name of the originator of the library.

member.name: D3D11_LIBRARY_DESC.Flags
member.summary: A combination of D3DCOMPILE Constants that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how the compiler compiles.

member.name: D3D11_LIBRARY_DESC.FunctionCount
member.summary: The number of functions exported from the library.
